widget.name: File Document Viewer
widget.description: A File Document Viewer. Should be used in a FileDocument based dataview

property.caption: Escape title
property.description: Title can contain HTML, which can result in an XSS if not escaped. Keep this to 'true', only change it if necessary.

property.caption: Width
property.description: Width of the viewer in pixels. Use '0' for auto. The height will depend on the contents.

property.caption: Height
property.description: Height of the viewer in pixels. Use '0' to determine the width automatically. This will use any remaining space.

property.caption: Show header
property.description: If true, a header including a 'pop out' and 'enlarge' button will be shown

property.caption: Use PDF js
property.description: Some browsers (Android for example) might run into problems displaying PDF files. We included PDFjs from Mozilla to display PDFs correctly. You can try this if you have problems. Warning: enable this if you are only using PDFs (other formats will result in an error)

property.caption: Hide "Open file" button
property.description: Hide the "Open File" button rendered by PDFjs

property.caption: Hide "Download" button
property.description: Hide the dowload button rendered by PDFjs

property.caption: Hide "Print" button
property.description: Hide the print button rendered by PDFjs
